intro: TIME TO TAKE THINGS TO THE NEXT LEVEL
whyAmI: In wich cases am I the coach you need ?
whyAmI1: >   If the outcome of games often feels out of your control
whyAmI2: >   If you make efforts but don’t see results
whyAmI3: >   If you think something is wrong with your gameplay but it’s hard to pinpoint exactly what or how to change it effectively
whyAmI4: >   If the emotional rollercoaster of soloQ is starting to weigh on you and you’re tired of relying on luck
whyAmI5: >   If you’re reluctant to play 1000 hours and spend a year to gain 4 or 5 divisions like most players, and you’d rather achieve that in a few weeks with a few hours of Coaching like most of my clients
whyAmI6: >   If you have real ambitions, I’m ready to reveal my secrets
whyAmI7: >   The methodology you’ll find here enabled a hardstuck D4 player for 5 years with goldfish-level attention span like me to climb to GM 689LP at rank 512.
whyAmI8: >   9 out of 10 master 0lp players have far superior natural talent in this game compared to me, yet 99.9% of them will never reach GM.
whyAmI9: But they don’t have the right process and guidance that I offer here.
learn1: Create a ticket on Discord (Kozo Mastery channel), and the staff will guide you, especially if you have further questions about the coaching process or to finalize the booking of our session.
obtainResults1: During the Coaching hour, don’t hesitate to ask me to clarify, as clarity of understanding is essential.
obtainResults2: You will have a much clearer idea of how to climb divisions and the keys to achieving it more (easily) effectively than ever!
someFeedbacks: Some feedback over the last few months
academyTitle: The Academy will be available soon
bad1: Are you done with having teammates that play like garbage and thinking to yourself, how can I have the same rank as those people?
bad2: If it often times feel like it's impossible to win yet you gave your all?
bad3: And then you lose motivation and play even worse.
bad4: You sometimes think that there is got to be something wrong with the way you play, but you can't fully grasp what it is.
solution1: Then you've come to the right place.
solution2: The pillar of my coaching is clarity. Because I believe clarity is key.
solution3: And the opposite of clarity brings frustration, suffering and delusion.
solution4: I had to make things so clear in my mind in order to get the kind of results that I got. And 99,99% of people would've never even reached master with the level of attention I had. This is why I had to change my thought process from the inside out, and see precisely what is wrong in my gameplay in order to fix it. And then I did, over and over again
discordText: Join our discord to stay updated
title1:
By reaching 689LP at rank 512 in GrandMaster,
I far exceeded what many players and coaches considered to be the limit of my potential after seeing me stuck in low Diamond for over 5 years.
body12: No one, I mean NO ONE has ever reached this elo with the attentional level I had.
body13: Being drowned in thoughts unrelated to the present moment 99% of the time and having an almost goldfish memory were the symptoms of my severe attention disorders.
body14: Just reaching Master, I’ve never seen anyone do it with a comparable level of attention or inattention because it required many hours of analysis and coaching as well as good mechanics to compensate.
body16: I know it sounds arrogant, but I’ve built a genuine pride through my unwavering determination and relentless discipline to achieve what I define as my Ikigai.
body17: Anyone can find that flame deep within and harness it. It’s also proof that the right methods can achieve miracles even if you’re unable to even focus in-game, which is the foundation of the game.
body18: Many players tilt 1 out of 3 games, spend thousands of hours spamming games to gain a few miserable divisions in a year.
body110: "You cannot solve a problem with the same level of consciousness that created it," Einstein roughly said.
body111: The brain is made up of programs, and if you keep repeating the same results over and over, it’s because you are programmed to get those results.
body112: With my expertise in performance optimization and high Challenger-level game knowledge, I will give you solutions with a much higher level of understanding to improve in-game and optimize your impact game after game.
body113: Why spend 1000 rather frustrating hours in the coming year to gain 3 divisions when my students who apply Kozo Mastery do it on average in 2 to 3 weeks, even though they were often stuck at their elo for several years?
body114: I’m deeply convinced that this game is a massive waste of time and a calamitous experience when you don’t have that sense of control and you go through win/lose streaks and the accompanying emotional rollercoasters without real progress.
body21: -> You need to replace the feeling of confusion or helplessness by seeing precisely what’s holding you back at your elo.
body22: -> You need to know exactly what to do to improve and the impact it will have on your elo, particularly through the right training goals.
body23: -> Eliminate or replace everything psychologically obstructing the correct progression process.
body24: Clarity is key, it leads to the sense of control that enables the flow state.
body31: •   I will give you a clear goal to learn as quickly as possible on your own. I will also open your perception to what’s really happening in your games and show you the game in full HD 4K.
body32: •   You will understand what you can actually do to optimize your impact and see more and more details that will help you climb.
body33: •   We’ll also dive deep into your psychology, understand the beliefs that limit you, and change them.
body34: •   I will teach you how to improve and provide you with the best methodology I’ve developed so your progress is exponential.
body35: I can’t wait to help you step up.
underLobby: I could never have imagined playing so many games in Challenger, let alone with the rank 1 on the ladder.
singleHoursDescr: Open your eyes with a single hour coaching session.
newRecruitsDescr: 1 hour discount for new recruits. Get a cheaper coaching
1MonthDescr: Get a daily followup on your progress with one of the juicy monthly plans
